item.title: How to check if TRIM is enabled on your SSD
item.description: God a fancy new drive? SSD maybe? TRIM support advertised? Well, here’s how you can check if TRIM support is actually enabled and working in your windows installation: Start a command prompt window (WIN+R, type cmd and press enter) In the command prompt window type the following: fsutil behavior query disabledeletenotify You will get one of the following: DisableDeleteNotify = 1 (Means that Windows TRIM commands are disabled) DisableDeleteNotify = 0 (Means that Windows TRIM commands are enabled)
